mapper.sql: recipient_id, recipient_tel, recipient_provinces, recipient_address, recipient_name, user_info_id
mapper.insert:
insert into recipient_info
recipient_id,
recipient_tel,
recipient_provinces,
recipient_address,
recipient_name,
user_info_id,
#{recipientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{recipientTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recipientProvinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recipientAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recipientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update recipient_info
recipient_tel = #{recipientTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recipient_provinces = #{recipientProvinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recipient_address = #{recipientAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recipient_name = #{recipientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_info_id = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where recipient_id = #{recipientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update recipient_info set recipient_tel = #{recipientTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recipient_provinces = #{recipientProvinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recipient_address = #{recipientAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recipient_name = #{recipientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_info_id = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where recipient_id = #{recipientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select recipient_id from recipient_info where recipient_name = #{recipientName}
select recipient_info.* from recipient_info left join user_info on user_info.user_info_id =recipient_info.user_info_id
